#summary Current features of project

=cl-osd on E-OSD features==
  * Run time
  * 2 Voltage inputs (one can be used for RSSI)

==cl-osd on G-OSD features==
  * Run time
  * 3 Voltage inputs (two can be used for RSSI)
  * GPS data
    * Lat, Long pos
    * Speed
    * Altitude
    * Time (UTC)
    * Date
    * Bearing
  * Home calculations
    * Distance to home
    * Bearing to home
    * Altitude above home
    * Arrow home
